sentences.zh: 中宮天極星，其一明者，太一常居也；

translations.literal: Central palace celestial pole star, the one bright one, Taiyi constantly dwells;
translations.idiomatic: In the central palace, the celestial pole star—the bright one—is where Taiyi constantly dwells;

translations.literal: Beside three stars Three Dukes, or called zi category.
translations.idiomatic: Beside it are three stars, the Three Dukes, or they are called the zi category.

sentences.zh: 後句四星，末大星正妃，餘三星後宮之屬也。

translations.literal: Behind hook four stars, last large star principal consort, remaining three stars harem category also.
translations.idiomatic: Behind are four stars in a hook shape; the last large star is the principal consort, and the remaining three stars belong to the harem.

translations.literal: Surrounding them guard and protect twelve stars, feudal ministers.
translations.idiomatic: Surrounding them are twelve stars that guard and protect—the feudal ministers.

translations.literal: All called Purple Palace.
translations.idiomatic: All are called the Purple Palace.

sentences.zh: 前列直斗口三星，隨北端兌，若見若不，曰陰德，或曰天一。

translations.literal: Front row aligned Dipper mouth three stars, following north end sharp, if visible if not, called Yinde, or called Tianyi.
translations.idiomatic: In front, aligned with the Dipper's mouth are three stars, following the northern end in a sharp formation, sometimes visible and sometimes not; they are called Yinde, or Tianyi.

sentences.zh: 紫宮左三星曰天槍，右五星曰天棓，後六星絕漢抵營室，曰閣道。

translations.literal: Purple Palace left three stars called Tianqiang, right five stars called Tianbang, behind six stars cross Milky Way reach Ying Shi, called Gedao.
translations.idiomatic: To the left of the Purple Palace are three stars called Tianqiang; to the right are five stars called Tianbang; behind are six stars that cross the Milky Way and reach Ying Shi, called Gedao.

sentences.zh: 北斗七星，所謂「旋、璣、玉衡以齊七政」。

translations.literal: Northern Dipper seven stars, so-called "Xuan, Ji, Yuheng to align seven administrative affairs".
translations.idiomatic: The Northern Dipper has seven stars, what is called "Xuan, Ji, and Yuheng to align the seven administrative affairs."

sentences.zh: 杓攜龍角，衡殷南斗，魁枕參首。

translations.literal: Handle carries Dragon Horn, beam aligns Southern Dipper, bowl rests on Shen head.
translations.idiomatic: The handle points to the Dragon's Horn; the beam aligns with the Southern Dipper; the bowl rests on the head of Shen.

translations.literal: Used at dusk to establish is handle;
translations.idiomatic: The one used at dusk to establish direction is the handle;

translations.literal: Handle, from Hua southwestward.
translations.idiomatic: The handle points from Hua southwestward.

translations.literal: Midnight establish is beam;
translations.idiomatic: The one used at midnight to establish direction is the beam;

translations.literal: Beam, aligns middle region Yellow River, Ji River between.
translations.idiomatic: The beam aligns with the middle region between the Yellow River and the Ji River.

translations.literal: Dawn establish is bowl;
translations.idiomatic: The one used at dawn to establish direction is the bowl;

translations.literal: Bowl, sea and Dai northeastward also.
translations.idiomatic: The bowl points northeastward from the sea and Dai.

sentences.zh: 斗為帝車，運于中央，臨制四鄉。

translations.literal: Dipper is emperor's chariot, moves in center, oversees and controls four directions.
translations.idiomatic: The Dipper is the emperor's chariot, moving in the center and overseeing and controlling the four directions.

sentences.zh: 分陰陽，建四時，均五行，移節度，定諸紀，皆系於斗。

translations.literal: Divide yin and yang, establish four seasons, balance five phases, shift degrees, determine various periods, all depend on Dipper.
translations.idiomatic: Dividing yin and yang, establishing the four seasons, balancing the five phases, shifting degrees, and determining various periods—all depend on the Dipper.

sentences.zh: 斗魁戴匡六星曰文昌宮：一曰上將，二曰次將，三曰貴相，四曰司命，五曰司中，六曰司祿。

translations.literal: Dipper bowl wears frame six stars called Wenchang Palace: first called superior general, second called secondary general, third called noble minister, fourth called Director of Fate, fifth called Director of Center, sixth called Director of Salary.
translations.idiomatic: The Dipper bowl wears a frame of six stars called the Wenchang Palace: the first is called the Superior General, the second the Secondary General, the third the Noble Minister, the fourth the Director of Fate, the fifth the Director of Center, and the sixth the Director of Salary.

translations.literal: In Dipper bowl center, noble person's prison.
translations.idiomatic: In the center of the Dipper bowl is the prison of noble persons.

sentences.zh: 魁下六星，兩兩相比者，名曰三能。

translations.literal: Bowl below six stars, two two compared, named San Neng.
translations.idiomatic: Below the bowl are six stars, arranged in pairs of two; they are named San Neng.

translations.literal: San Neng color uniform, ruler and minister harmonious;
translations.idiomatic: When the San Neng's colors are uniform, the ruler and ministers are harmonious;

translations.literal: Not uniform, indicates discord.
translations.idiomatic: when they are not uniform, it indicates discord.

translations.literal: Auxiliary star bright and near, auxiliary minister close and strong;
translations.idiomatic: When the auxiliary star is bright and near, the auxiliary ministers are close and strong;

translations.literal: Repelled small, distant and weak.
translations.idiomatic: when it is repelled and small, they are distant and weak.

sentences.zh: 杓端有兩星：一內為矛，招搖；

translations.literal: Handle end has two stars: one inner is spear, Zhaoyao;
translations.idiomatic: At the end of the handle are two stars: the inner one is the spear, Zhaoyao;

translations.literal: One outer is shield, Tianfeng.
translations.idiomatic: the outer one is the shield, Tianfeng.

sentences.zh: 有句圜十五星，屬杓，曰賤人之牢。

translations.literal: Has hook circle fifteen stars, belong to handle, called common person's prison.
translations.idiomatic: There are fifteen stars in a hook-shaped circle, belonging to the handle, called the prison of common persons.

sentences.zh: 其牢中星實則囚多，虛則開出。

translations.literal: That prison center stars full then prisoners many, empty then released.
translations.idiomatic: When the stars in that prison are full, there are many prisoners; when they are empty, prisoners are released.

sentences.zh: 天一、槍、棓、矛、盾動搖，角大，兵起。

translations.literal: Tianyi, Qiang, Bang, spear, shield shake, angle large, troops arise.
translations.idiomatic: When Tianyi, Qiang, Bang, the spear, and the shield shake, and the angle is large, troops will arise.

translations.literal: Eastern Palace Azure Dragon, Fang, Xin.
translations.idiomatic: The Eastern Palace is the Azure Dragon, with Fang and Xin.

sentences.zh: 心為明堂，大星天王，前後星子屬。

translations.literal: Xin is bright hall, large star heavenly king, front and back stars zi category.
translations.idiomatic: Xin is the bright hall; the large star is the heavenly king, and the stars before and after it belong to the zi category.

translations.literal: Not want straight, straight then heavenly king loses plan.
translations.idiomatic: They should not be straight; if they are straight, the heavenly king will lose his plans.

translations.literal: Fang is mansion, called Tian Si.
translations.idiomatic: Fang is the mansion, called Tian Si.

translations.literal: Its yin, right outer horse.
translations.idiomatic: To its yin side is the right outer horse.

translations.literal: Beside has two stars called Jin;
translations.idiomatic: Beside it are two stars called Jin;

translations.literal: North one star called Xia.
translations.idiomatic: To the north is one star called Xia.

translations.literal: Northeast curved twelve stars called banner.
translations.idiomatic: To the northeast are twelve stars in a curve called the banner.

translations.literal: Banner center four stars heavenly market;
translations.idiomatic: In the center of the banner are four stars of the heavenly market;

translations.literal: Center six stars called market tower.
translations.idiomatic: In the center are six stars called the market tower.

translations.literal: Market center stars numerous then full;
translations.idiomatic: When the stars in the market center are numerous, it is full;

translations.literal: Its empty then exhausted.
translations.idiomatic: when it is empty, there is exhaustion.

translations.literal: Fang south numerous stars called cavalry officials.
translations.idiomatic: To the south of Fang are numerous stars called the cavalry officials.

translations.literal: Left horn, Li;
translations.idiomatic: The left horn is Li;

translations.literal: Right horn, general.
translations.idiomatic: the right horn is the general.

translations.literal: Large horn, heavenly king emperor's court.
translations.idiomatic: The large horn is the heavenly king's imperial court.

sentences.zh: 其兩旁各有三星，鼎足句之，曰攝提。

translations.literal: Its two sides each have three stars, tripod leg hook them, called Sheti.
translations.idiomatic: On its two sides are three stars each, arranged like tripod legs in a hook formation; they are called Sheti.

sentences.zh: 攝提者，直斗杓所指，以建時節，故曰「攝提格」。

translations.literal: Sheti, straight Dipper handle points, to establish seasons, therefore called "Shetige".
translations.idiomatic: Sheti points straight where the Dipper handle points, and is used to establish the seasons; therefore it is called "Shetige."

translations.literal: Kang is sparse temple, governs illness.
translations.idiomatic: Kang is the sparse temple and governs illness.

translations.literal: Its north south two large stars, called South Gate.
translations.idiomatic: To its north and south are two large stars called the South Gate.

translations.literal: Di is heavenly root, governs epidemic.
translations.idiomatic: Di is the heavenly root and governs epidemics.

translations.literal: Tail is nine sons, called ruler and ministers;
translations.idiomatic: The tail is the nine sons, called the ruler and ministers;

translations.literal: Repelled and cut off, not harmonious.
translations.idiomatic: When they are repelled and cut off, there is disharmony.

translations.literal: Ji is arrogant guest, called mouth and tongue.
translations.idiomatic: Ji is the arrogant guest, called mouth and tongue.

translations.literal: Fire offends and guards horn, then has war.
translations.idiomatic: When fire offends and guards the horn, there will be war.

translations.literal: Fang, Xin, king detests them also.
translations.idiomatic: Fang and Xin are detested by the king.

translations.literal: Southern Palace Vermillion Bird, Quan, Heng.
translations.idiomatic: The Southern Palace is the Vermillion Bird, with Quan and Heng.

translations.literal: Heng, Taiwei, three lights court.
translations.idiomatic: Heng is Taiwei, the court of the three lights.

translations.literal: Guard and protect twelve stars, feudal ministers: west, general;
translations.idiomatic: There are twelve stars that guard and protect—the feudal ministers: to the west, the general;

translations.literal: East, minister;
translations.idiomatic: to the east, the minister;

translations.literal: South four stars, enforce law;
translations.idiomatic: to the south are four stars that enforce the law;

translations.literal: Center, main gate;
translations.idiomatic: In the center is the main gate;

translations.literal: Gate left right, side gates.
translations.idiomatic: To the left and right of the gate are the side gates.

translations.literal: Gate inside six stars, feudal lords.
translations.idiomatic: Inside the gate are six stars—the feudal lords.

translations.literal: Its inside five stars, Five Emperors seat.
translations.idiomatic: Inside it are five stars—the seats of the Five Emperors.

sentences.zh: 後聚一十五星，蔚然，曰郎位；

translations.literal: Behind gather fifteen stars, luxuriant, called gentlemen positions;
translations.idiomatic: Behind, gathered together, are fifteen stars in luxuriant array, called the gentlemen positions;

translations.literal: Beside one large star, general position also.
translations.idiomatic: Beside them is one large star—the general's position.

sentences.zh: 月、五星順入，軌道，司其出，所守，天子所誅也。

translations.literal: Moon, five stars follow enter, follow path, oversee their exit, what they guard, Son of Heaven executes also.
translations.idiomatic: When the moon and the five stars enter in proper order and follow their paths, they oversee their exits and what they guard; this is what the Son of Heaven executes.

sentences.zh: 其逆入，若不軌道，以所犯命之；

translations.literal: Their reverse enter, if not follow path, by what they offend name them;
translations.idiomatic: When they enter in reverse, or if they do not follow their paths, they are named according to what they offend;

sentences.zh: 中坐，成形，皆群下從謀也。

translations.literal: Center seat, form shape, all subordinates follow plotting also.
translations.idiomatic: When the center seat forms a shape, it means all subordinates are following in plotting.

translations.literal: Metal, fire especially so.
translations.idiomatic: Metal and fire are especially so.

sentences.zh: 廷藩西有隋星五，曰少微，士大夫。

translations.literal: Court feudatory west has drooping stars five, called Shaowei, scholar-officials.
translations.idiomatic: To the west of the court feudatories are five drooping stars called Shaowei—the scholar-officials.

translations.literal: Quan, Xuanyuan.
translations.idiomatic: Quan is Xuanyuan.

translations.literal: Xuanyuan, yellow dragon body.
translations.idiomatic: Xuanyuan is the body of the yellow dragon.

translations.literal: Front large star, female ruler image;
translations.idiomatic: The large star in front is the image of the female ruler;

translations.literal: Beside small stars, attendants harem category.
translations.idiomatic: the small stars beside it belong to the attendants of the harem.

translations.literal: Moon, five stars guard and offend, like Heng divination.
translations.idiomatic: When the moon and the five stars guard and offend, it is divined like Heng.

translations.literal: Eastern Well is water affairs.
translations.idiomatic: The Eastern Well governs water affairs.

translations.literal: Its west curved star called Yue.
translations.idiomatic: To its west is a curved star called Yue.

translations.literal: Yue north, Northern River;
translations.idiomatic: To the north of Yue is the Northern River;

translations.literal: South, Southern River;
translations.idiomatic: to the south is the Southern River;

translations.literal: Two rivers, Heavenly Gate between is pass and bridge.
translations.idiomatic: Between the two rivers and the Heavenly Gate is the pass and bridge.

translations.literal: Chariot Ghost, ghost temple affairs;
translations.idiomatic: The Chariot Ghost governs ghost temple affairs.

translations.literal: Center white one is hostage.
translations.idiomatic: The white one in the center is the hostage.

sentences.zh: 火守南北河，兵起，穀不登。

translations.literal: Fire guards north south rivers, troops arise, grain not harvest.
translations.idiomatic: When fire guards the northern and southern rivers, troops will arise and grain will not be harvested.

sentences.zh: 故德成衡，觀成潢，傷成鉞，禍成井，誅成質。

translations.literal: Therefore virtue becomes Heng, observation becomes Huang, injury becomes Yue, calamity becomes Well, execution becomes hostage.
translations.idiomatic: Therefore virtue is manifested in Heng, observation in Huang, injury in Yue, calamity in the Well, and execution in the hostage.

translations.literal: Willow is bird beak, governs trees and grass.
translations.idiomatic: Willow is the bird's beak and governs trees and grass.

translations.literal: Seven stars, neck, are round official.
translations.idiomatic: The seven stars are the neck and are the round official.

translations.literal: Governs urgent affairs.
translations.idiomatic: They govern urgent affairs.

translations.literal: Zhang, net, is kitchen, governs toasting guests.
translations.idiomatic: Zhang is the net, is the kitchen, and governs toasting guests.

translations.literal: Wing is feather quill, governs distant guests.
translations.idiomatic: The wing is the feather quill and governs distant guests.

translations.literal: Zhen is chariot, governs wind.
translations.idiomatic: Zhen is the chariot and governs wind.

sentences.zh: 其旁有一小星，曰長沙，星星不欲明；

translations.literal: Its side has one small star, called Changsha, star star not want bright;
translations.idiomatic: Beside it is one small star called Changsha; the stars should not be bright;

sentences.zh: 明與四星等，若五星入軫中，兵大起。

translations.literal: Bright with four stars equal, if five stars enter Zhen center, troops greatly arise.
translations.idiomatic: If it is bright and equal to the four stars, or if the five stars enter the center of Zhen, troops will greatly arise.

translations.literal: Zhen south numerous stars called Heavenly Storehouse Tower;
translations.idiomatic: To the south of Zhen are numerous stars called the Heavenly Storehouse Tower;

translations.literal: Storehouse has five chariots.
translations.idiomatic: The storehouse has five chariots.

sentences.zh: 車星角若益眾，及不具，無處車馬。

translations.literal: Chariot stars angles if increase numerous, and not complete, nowhere chariots and horses.
translations.idiomatic: If the angles of the chariot stars increase in number, or if they are not complete, there will be nowhere for chariots and horses.

translations.literal: Western Palace Xianchi, called Heavenly Five Huang.
translations.idiomatic: The Western Palace is Xianchi, called the Heavenly Five Huang.

translations.literal: Five Huang, Five Emperors chariot lodgings.
translations.idiomatic: The Five Huang are the chariot lodgings of the Five Emperors.

translations.literal: Fire enters, drought;
translations.idiomatic: When fire enters, there will be drought;

translations.literal: Metal, troops;
translations.idiomatic: when metal enters, there will be troops;

translations.literal: Water, water.
translations.idiomatic: when water enters, there will be water.

translations.literal: Center has three pillars;
translations.idiomatic: In the center are three pillars;

translations.literal: Pillars not complete, troops arise.
translations.idiomatic: When the pillars are not complete, troops will arise.

translations.literal: Kui called sealed pig, is ditches and channels.
translations.idiomatic: Kui is called the sealed pig and is ditches and channels.

translations.literal: Lou is gathering multitude.
translations.idiomatic: Lou is the gathering of the multitude.

translations.literal: Wei is heavenly granary.
translations.idiomatic: Wei is the heavenly granary.

translations.literal: Its south numerous stars called grain storage.
translations.idiomatic: To its south are numerous stars called grain storage.

sentences.zh: 昴曰髦頭，胡星也，為白衣會。

translations.literal: Mao called hairy head, barbarian star also, is white clothing gathering.
translations.idiomatic: Mao is called the hairy head; it is a barbarian star and is the white clothing gathering.

sentences.zh: 畢曰罕車，為邊兵，主弋獵。

translations.literal: Bi called net chariot, is border troops, governs shooting and hunting.
translations.idiomatic: Bi is called the net chariot, is the border troops, and governs shooting and hunting.

translations.literal: Its large star beside small star is attached ear.
translations.idiomatic: The small star beside its large star is the attached ear.

sentences.zh: 附耳搖動，有讒亂臣在側。

translations.literal: Attached ear shakes, has slandering and chaotic ministers at side.
translations.idiomatic: When the attached ear shakes, there are slandering and chaotic ministers at the side.

translations.literal: Mao, Bi between is heavenly street.
translations.idiomatic: Between Mao and Bi is the heavenly street.

translations.literal: Its yin, yin state;
translations.idiomatic: To its yin side is the yin state;

translations.literal: Yang, yang state.
translations.idiomatic: to its yang side is the yang state.

translations.literal: Shen is white tiger.
translations.idiomatic: Shen is the white tiger.

translations.literal: Three stars straight, this is balance stone.
translations.idiomatic: The three stars in a straight line are the balance stone.

sentences.zh: 下有三星，兌，曰罰，為斬艾事。

translations.literal: Below has three stars, sharp, called punishment, is cutting and weeding affairs.
translations.idiomatic: Below are three stars in a sharp formation, called punishment, which govern cutting and weeding affairs.

translations.literal: Its outside four stars, left right shoulder and thigh also.
translations.idiomatic: Outside it are four stars—the left and right shoulders and thighs.

sentences.zh: 小三星隅置，曰觜觿，為虎首，主葆旅事。

translations.literal: Small three stars corner placed, called Zixi, is tiger head, governs protection and travel affairs.
translations.idiomatic: Three small stars placed in the corner are called Zixi; they are the tiger's head and govern protection and travel affairs.

translations.literal: Its south has four stars, called heavenly latrine.
translations.idiomatic: To its south are four stars called the heavenly latrine.

translations.literal: Latrine below one star, called heavenly arrow.
translations.idiomatic: Below the latrine is one star called the heavenly arrow.

translations.literal: Arrow yellow then auspicious;
translations.idiomatic: When the arrow is yellow, it is auspicious;

translations.literal: Blue, white, black, inauspicious.
translations.idiomatic: when it is blue, white, or black, it is inauspicious.

sentences.zh: 其西有句曲九星，三處羅：一曰天旗，二曰天苑，三曰九游。

translations.literal: Its west has hook curved nine stars, three places arranged: first called heavenly banner, second called heavenly garden, third called nine banners.
translations.idiomatic: To its west are nine stars in a hook-shaped curve, arranged in three places: the first is called the heavenly banner, the second the heavenly garden, and the third the nine banners.

translations.literal: Its east has large star called wolf.
translations.idiomatic: To its east is a large star called the wolf.

translations.literal: Wolf horn changes color, many bandits and thieves.
translations.idiomatic: When the wolf's horn changes color, there will be many bandits and thieves.

translations.literal: Below has four stars called bow, aligned with wolf.
translations.idiomatic: Below are four stars called the bow, aligned with the wolf.

sentences.zh: 狼比地有大星，曰南極老人。

translations.literal: Wolf near earth has large star, called South Pole Old Man.
translations.idiomatic: Near the wolf, close to the earth, is a large star called the South Pole Old Man.

translations.literal: Old Man visible, order peaceful;
translations.idiomatic: When the Old Man is visible, there will be peace and order;

translations.literal: Not visible, troops arise.
translations.idiomatic: when he is not visible, troops will arise.

sentences.zh: 常以秋分時候之于南郊。

translations.literal: Constantly at autumn equinox time wait for it at southern suburb.
translations.idiomatic: One constantly waits for it at the southern suburb at the time of the autumn equinox.

translations.literal: Attached ear enters Bi center, troops arise.
translations.idiomatic: When the attached ear enters the center of Bi, troops will arise.

translations.literal: Northern Palace Dark Warrior, Xu, Wei.
translations.idiomatic: The Northern Palace is the Dark Warrior, with Xu and Wei.

translations.literal: Wei is covering house;
translations.idiomatic: Wei is the covering house;

translations.literal: Xu is weeping and wailing affairs.
translations.idiomatic: Xu governs weeping and wailing affairs.

sentences.zh: 其南有眾星，曰羽林天軍。

translations.literal: Its south has numerous stars, called Feather Forest Heavenly Army.
translations.idiomatic: To its south are numerous stars called the Feather Forest Heavenly Army.

translations.literal: Army west is rampart, or called Yue.
translations.idiomatic: To the west of the army is the rampart, or it is called Yue.

translations.literal: Beside has one large star is Beiluo.
translations.idiomatic: Beside it is one large star called Beiluo.

sentences.zh: 北落若微亡，軍星動角益希，及五星犯北落，入軍，軍起。

translations.literal: Beiluo if faint and lost, army stars move angles increasingly rare, and five stars offend Beiluo, enter army, army arises.
translations.idiomatic: If Beiluo is faint and lost, and the army stars move with angles increasingly rare, or if the five stars offend Beiluo and enter the army, the army will arise.

translations.literal: Fire, metal, water especially so: fire, army worry;
translations.idiomatic: Fire, metal, and water are especially so: when fire enters, the army will have worries;

translations.literal: Water, water disaster;
translations.idiomatic: when water enters, there will be water disasters;

translations.literal: Wood, earth, army auspicious.
translations.idiomatic: when wood or earth enters, it is auspicious for the army.

sentences.zh: 危東六星，兩兩相比，曰司空。

translations.literal: Wei east six stars, two two compared, called Sikong.
translations.idiomatic: To the east of Wei are six stars, arranged in pairs of two; they are called Sikong.

sentences.zh: 營室為清廟，曰離宮、閣道。

translations.literal: Ying Shi is pure temple, called detached palace, covered way.
translations.idiomatic: Ying Shi is the pure temple, called the detached palace and the covered way.

translations.literal: Milky Way center four stars, called Tian Si.
translations.idiomatic: In the center of the Milky Way are four stars called Tian Si.

translations.literal: Beside one star, called Wang Liang.
translations.idiomatic: Beside it is one star called Wang Liang.

translations.literal: Wang Liang whips horse, chariots and cavalry fill fields.
translations.idiomatic: When Wang Liang whips his horse, chariots and cavalry will fill the fields.

translations.literal: Beside has eight stars, cross Milky Way, called Tianhuang.
translations.idiomatic: Beside it are eight stars that cross the Milky Way, called Tianhuang.

translations.literal: Tianhuang beside, River Star.
translations.idiomatic: Beside Tianhuang is the River Star.

translations.literal: River Star moves, people wade water.
translations.idiomatic: When the River Star moves, people will wade through water.

translations.literal: Pestle, mortar four stars, at Wei south.
translations.idiomatic: The pestle and mortar are four stars, located to the south of Wei.

sentences.zh: 匏瓜，有青黑星守之，魚鹽貴。

translations.literal: Gourd, has blue black star guards it, fish salt expensive.
translations.idiomatic: The gourd: when blue or black stars guard it, fish and salt will be expensive.

translations.literal: Southern Dipper is temple, its north Jian star.
translations.idiomatic: The Southern Dipper is the temple; to its north is the Jian star.

translations.literal: Jian star, banner also.
translations.idiomatic: The Jian star is the banner.

translations.literal: Leading Ox is sacrifice.
translations.idiomatic: The Leading Ox is the sacrifice.

translations.literal: Its north River Drum.
translations.idiomatic: To its north is the River Drum.

translations.literal: River Drum large star, superior general;
translations.idiomatic: The large star of the River Drum is the superior general;

translations.literal: Left right, left right generals.
translations.idiomatic: to the left and right are the left and right generals.

translations.literal: Wunu, its north Weaving Maiden.
translations.idiomatic: Wunu: to its north is the Weaving Maiden.

translations.literal: Weaving Maiden, heavenly woman granddaughter also.
translations.idiomatic: The Weaving Maiden is the granddaughter of the heavenly woman.

sentences.zh: 察日、月之行以揆歲星順逆。

translations.literal: Observe sun, moon movement to measure Year Star forward and reverse.
translations.idiomatic: Observe the movement of the sun and moon to measure the forward and reverse motion of the Year Star.

translations.literal: Called eastern wood, governs spring, days Jia Yi.
translations.idiomatic: It is called the eastern wood, governs spring, and corresponds to the days Jia and Yi.

translations.literal: Righteousness lost, punishment comes from Year Star.
translations.idiomatic: When righteousness is lost, punishment comes from the Year Star.

translations.literal: Year Star excess and contraction, by its lodge names state.
translations.idiomatic: When the Year Star expands or contracts, it names the state by its lodge.

sentences.zh: 所在國不可伐，可以罰人。

translations.literal: Located state cannot attack, can punish people.
translations.idiomatic: The state where it is located cannot be attacked, but one can punish the people.

sentences.zh: 其趨舍而前曰贏，退舍曰縮。

translations.literal: Its hasten lodge and forward called excess, retreat lodge called contraction.
translations.idiomatic: When it hastens forward in its lodge, it is called excess; when it retreats in its lodge, it is called contraction.

translations.literal: Excess, its state has troops not return;
translations.idiomatic: When there is excess, that state will have troops that do not return;

sentences.zh: 縮，其國有憂，將亡，國傾敗。

translations.literal: Contraction, its state has worries, will perish, state collapse and fail.
translations.idiomatic: When there is contraction, that state will have worries, the general will perish, and the state will collapse and fail.

sentences.zh: 其所在，五星皆從而聚於一舍，其下之國可以義致天下。

translations.literal: Its location, five stars all follow and gather at one lodge, its below state can by righteousness reach all under heaven.
translations.idiomatic: When it is at its location, and all five stars follow and gather at one lodge, the state below it can reach all under heaven through righteousness.

sentences.zh: 以攝提格歲：歲陰左行在寅，歲星右轉居丑。

translations.literal: Using Shetige year: year yin left moves at Yin, Year Star right turns dwells at Chou.
translations.idiomatic: In the Shetige year: the year yin moves left and is at Yin, and the Year Star turns right and dwells at Chou.

sentences.zh: 正月，與斗、牽牛晨出東方，名曰監德。

translations.literal: First month, with Dipper, Leading Ox dawn emerge east, named Jiande.
translations.idiomatic: In the first month, it emerges in the east at dawn with the Dipper and the Leading Ox, and is named Jiande.

translations.literal: Color azure has light.
translations.idiomatic: Its color is azure and has light.

translations.literal: Its lose position, has response visible at Willow.
translations.idiomatic: When it loses its position, there will be a response visible at Willow.

translations.literal: Year early, water;
translations.idiomatic: If the year is early, there will be water;

translations.literal: Late, drought.
translations.idiomatic: if it is late, there will be drought.

sentences.zh: 歲星出，東行十二度，百日而止，反逆行；

translations.literal: Year Star emerges, east moves twelve degrees, hundred days and stops, reverses retrograde;
translations.idiomatic: When the Year Star emerges, it moves east for twelve degrees, stops after a hundred days, and then reverses to retrograde;

translations.literal: Retrograde eight degrees, hundred days, again east moves.
translations.idiomatic: It retrogrades for eight degrees over a hundred days, then again moves east.

sentences.zh: 歲行三十度十六分度之七，率日行十二分度之一，十二歲而周天。

translations.literal: Year moves thirty degrees and seven sixteenths of a degree, rate daily moves one twelfth of a degree, twelve years and circles heaven.
translations.idiomatic: The Year Star moves thirty degrees and seven sixteenths of a degree per year, at a rate of one twelfth of a degree per day, and completes a circuit of heaven in twelve years.

translations.literal: Emerges constantly east, at dawn;
translations.idiomatic: It constantly emerges in the east at dawn.

translations.literal: Enters at west, uses dusk.
translations.idiomatic: it enters in the west at dusk.

sentences.zh: 單閼歲：歲陰在卯，星居子。

translations.literal: Shan E year: year yin at Mao, star dwells at Zi.
translations.idiomatic: In the Shan E year: the year yin is at Mao, and the star dwells at Zi.

sentences.zh: 以二月與婺女、虛、危晨出，曰降入。

translations.literal: Using second month with Wunu, Xu, Wei dawn emerge, called Jiangru.
translations.idiomatic: In the second month, it emerges at dawn with Wunu, Xu, and Wei, and is called Jiangru.

translations.literal: Greatly has light.
translations.idiomatic: It has great light.

translations.literal: Its lose position, has response visible at Zhang.
translations.idiomatic: When it loses its position, there will be a response visible at Zhang.

translations.literal: [Named Jiangru] that year great water.
translations.idiomatic: [Named Jiangru] In that year there will be great floods.

sentences.zh: 執徐歲：歲陰在辰，星居亥。

translations.literal: Zhi Xu year: year yin at Chen, star dwells at Hai.
translations.idiomatic: In the Zhi Xu year: the year yin is at Chen, and the star dwells at Hai.

sentences.zh: 以三月［居］與營室、東壁晨出，曰青章。

translations.literal: Using third month [dwells] with Ying Shi, Eastern Wall dawn emerge, called Qingzhang.
translations.idiomatic: In the third month, it emerges at dawn with Ying Shi and the Eastern Wall, and is called Qingzhang.

translations.literal: Azure azure very bright.
translations.idiomatic: It is very bright azure.

translations.literal: Its lose position;
translations.idiomatic: When it loses its position, there will be a response.

translations.literal: Has response visible at Zhen.
translations.idiomatic: there will be a response visible at Zhen.

translations.literal: [Called Qingzhang] year early, drought;
translations.idiomatic: [Called Qingzhang] If the year is early, there will be drought;

translations.literal: Late, water.
translations.idiomatic: if it is late, there will be water.

sentences.zh: 大荒駱歲：歲陰在巳，星居戌。

translations.literal: Da Huang Luo year: year yin at Si, star dwells at Xu.
translations.idiomatic: In the Da Huang Luo year: the year yin is at Si, and the star dwells at Xu.

sentences.zh: 以四月與奎、婁［胃昴］晨出，曰跰踵。

translations.literal: Using fourth month with Kui, Lou [Wei Mao] dawn emerge, called Bingzhong.
translations.idiomatic: In the fourth month, it emerges at dawn with Kui and Lou [Wei and Mao], and is called Bingzhong.

translations.literal: Blazing blazing red color, has light.
translations.idiomatic: It is blazing red in color and has light.

translations.literal: Its lose position, has response visible at Kang.
translations.idiomatic: When it loses its position, there will be a response visible at Kang.

sentences.zh: 敦牂歲：歲陰在午，星居酉。

translations.literal: Dun Zang year: year yin at Wu, star dwells at You.
translations.idiomatic: In the Dun Zang year: the year yin is at Wu, and the star dwells at You.

sentences.zh: 以五月與胃、昴、畢晨出，曰開明。

translations.literal: Using fifth month with Wei, Mao, Bi dawn emerge, called Kaiming.
translations.idiomatic: In the fifth month, it emerges at dawn with Wei, Mao, and Bi, and is called Kaiming.

translations.literal: Blazing blazing has light.
translations.idiomatic: It is blazing and has light.

translations.literal: Lay down troops;
translations.idiomatic: troops will be laid down;

translations.literal: Only benefits duke and king, not benefits governing troops.
translations.idiomatic: It only benefits the duke and king; it does not benefit governing troops.

translations.literal: Its lose position, has response visible at Fang.
translations.idiomatic: When it loses its position, there will be a response visible at Fang.

translations.literal: Year early, drought;
translations.idiomatic: If the year is early, there will be drought;

translations.literal: Late, water.
translations.idiomatic: if it is late, there will be water.

sentences.zh: 協洽歲：歲陰在未，星居申。

translations.literal: Xie Qiao year: year yin at Wei, star dwells at Shen.
translations.idiomatic: In the Xie Qiao year: the year yin is at Wei, and the star dwells at Shen.

sentences.zh: 以六月與觜觿、參晨出，曰長列。

translations.literal: Using sixth month with Zixi, Shen dawn emerge, called Changlie.
translations.idiomatic: In the sixth month, it emerges at dawn with Zixi and Shen, and is called Changlie.

translations.literal: Bright bright has light.
translations.idiomatic: It is bright and has light.

translations.literal: Benefits moving troops.
translations.idiomatic: It benefits moving troops.

translations.literal: Its lose position, has response visible at Ji.
translations.idiomatic: When it loses its position, there will be a response visible at Ji.

sentences.zh: 涒灘歲：歲陰在申，星居未。

translations.literal: Dun Tan year: year yin at Shen, star dwells at Wei.
translations.idiomatic: In the Dun Tan year: the year yin is at Shen, and the star dwells at Wei.

sentences.zh: 以七月與東井、輿鬼晨出，曰大音。

translations.literal: Using seventh month with Eastern Well, Chariot Ghost dawn emerge, called Dayin.
translations.idiomatic: In the seventh month, it emerges at dawn with the Eastern Well and the Chariot Ghost, and is called Dayin.

translations.literal: Bright bright white.
translations.idiomatic: It is bright and white.

translations.literal: Its lose position, has response visible at Leading Ox.
translations.idiomatic: When it loses its position, there will be a response visible at the Leading Ox.

sentences.zh: 作鄂歲：歲陰在酉，星居午。

translations.literal: Zuo E year: year yin at You, star dwells at Wu.
translations.idiomatic: In the Zuo E year: the year yin is at You, and the star dwells at Wu.

sentences.zh: 以八月與柳、七星、張晨出，曰（為）長王。

translations.literal: Using eighth month with Willow, Seven Stars, Zhang dawn emerge, called (is) Changwang.
translations.idiomatic: In the eighth month, it emerges at dawn with the Willow, the Seven Stars, and Zhang, and is called Changwang.

translations.literal: Vigorous vigorous has radiance.
translations.idiomatic: It is vigorous and has radiance.

translations.literal: State its prosper, ripe grain.
translations.idiomatic: The state will prosper, and the grain will ripen.

translations.literal: Its lose position, has response visible at Wei.
translations.idiomatic: When it loses its position, there will be a response visible at Wei.

sentences.zh: ［曰大章］有旱而昌，有女喪，民疾。

translations.literal: [Called Dazhang] has drought and prosper, has woman death, people illness.
translations.idiomatic: [Called Dazhang] There will be drought and prosperity, there will be deaths of women, and the people will suffer from illness.

sentences.zh: 閹茂歲：歲陰在戌，星居巳。

translations.literal: Yan Mao year: year yin at Xu, star dwells at Si.
translations.idiomatic: In the Yan Mao year: the year yin is at Xu, and the star dwells at Si.

sentences.zh: 以九月與翼、軫晨出，曰天睢。

translations.literal: Using ninth month with Wings, Zhen dawn emerge, called Tiansui.
translations.idiomatic: In the ninth month, it emerges at dawn with the Wings and Zhen, and is called Tiansui.

translations.literal: White color greatly bright.
translations.idiomatic: Its white color is greatly bright.

translations.literal: Its lose position, has response visible at Eastern Wall.
translations.idiomatic: When it loses its position, there will be a response visible at the Eastern Wall.

translations.literal: Year water, woman death.
translations.idiomatic: In that year there will be water, and there will be deaths of women.

sentences.zh: 大淵獻歲：歲陰在亥，星居辰。

translations.literal: Da Yuan Xian year: year yin at Hai, star dwells at Chen.
translations.idiomatic: In the Da Yuan Xian year: the year yin is at Hai, and the star dwells at Chen.

sentences.zh: 以十月與角、亢晨出，曰大章。

translations.literal: Using tenth month with Horn, Kang dawn emerge, called Dazhang.
translations.idiomatic: In the tenth month, it emerges at dawn with the Horn and Kang, and is called Dazhang.

sentences.zh: 蒼蒼然，星若躍而陰出旦，是謂「正平」。

translations.literal: Azure azure so, star as if leap and yin emerge dawn, this called "Zhengping".
translations.idiomatic: It is azure, and if the star appears to leap and emerge at dawn in the yin position, this is called "Zhengping".

translations.literal: Rise army troops, its leader must martial;
translations.idiomatic: When armies are raised, their leaders must be martial;

translations.literal: Its state has virtue, will have four seas.
translations.idiomatic: That state will have virtue, and will possess the four seas.

translations.literal: Its lose position, has response visible at Lou.
translations.idiomatic: When it loses its position, there will be a response visible at Lou.

sentences.zh: 困敦歲：歲陰在子，星居卯。

translations.literal: Kun Dun year: year yin at Zi, star dwells at Mao.
translations.idiomatic: In the Kun Dun year: the year yin is at Zi, and the star dwells at Mao.

sentences.zh: 以十一月與氐、房、心晨出，曰天泉。

translations.literal: Using eleventh month with Di, Fang, Heart dawn emerge, called Tianquan.
translations.idiomatic: In the eleventh month, it emerges at dawn with Di, Fang, and the Heart, and is called Tianquan.

translations.literal: Mysterious color very bright.
translations.idiomatic: Its mysterious color is very bright.

translations.literal: Rivers pools its prosper, not benefits raising troops.
translations.idiomatic: Rivers and pools will prosper, and it does not benefit raising troops.

translations.literal: Its lose position, has response (at) [visible] Mao.
translations.idiomatic: When it loses its position, there will be a response visible at Mao.

sentences.zh: 赤奮若歲：歲陰在丑，星居寅，以十二月與尾、箕晨出，曰天皓。

translations.literal: Chi Fen Ruo year: year yin at Chou, star dwells at Yin, using twelfth month with Tail, Ji dawn emerge, called Tianhao.
translations.idiomatic: In the Chi Fen Ruo year: the year yin is at Chou, and the star dwells at Yin. In the twelfth month, it emerges at dawn with the Tail and Ji, and is called Tianhao.

translations.literal: Dark so black color very bright.
translations.idiomatic: It is dark black in color and very bright.

translations.literal: Its lose position, has response visible at Shen.
translations.idiomatic: When it loses its position, there will be a response visible at Shen.

sentences.zh: 當居不居，居之又左右搖，未當去去之，與他星會，其國凶。

translations.literal: Should dwell not dwell, dwells it again left right shake, not should leave leave it, with other star meet, its state inauspicious.
translations.idiomatic: When it should dwell but does not dwell, or when it dwells and shakes left and right, or when it leaves before it should leave and meets with the other stars, that state will be inauspicious.

translations.literal: Where dwells long, state has virtue thick.
translations.idiomatic: Where it dwells for a long time, the state will have abundant virtue.

sentences.zh: 其角動，乍小乍大，若色數變，人主有憂。

translations.literal: Its horn moves, suddenly small suddenly large, if color repeatedly changes, person ruler has worries.
translations.idiomatic: When its horn moves, now small and now large, and if its color changes repeatedly, the ruler will have worries.

sentences.zh: 其失次舍以下，進而東北，三月生天棓，長四丈，末兌，進而東南，三月生彗星，長二丈，類彗。

translations.literal: Its lose position lodge and below, advance and northeast, three months produces Tianbang, length four zhang, end sharp, advance and southeast, three months produces comet star, length two zhang, like comet.
translations.idiomatic: When it loses its position and lodge, if it advances to the northeast, after three months Tianbang will appear, four zhang in length with a sharp end; if it advances to the southeast, after three months a comet will appear, two zhang in length, resembling a comet.

sentences.zh: 退而西北，三月生天欃，長四丈，末兌。

translations.literal: Retreat and northwest, three months produces Tianchan, length four zhang, end sharp.
translations.idiomatic: If it retreats to the northwest, after three months Tianchan will appear, four zhang in length with a sharp end.

sentences.zh: 退而西南，三月生天槍，長數丈，兩頭兌。

translations.literal: Retreat and southwest, three months produces Tianqiang, length several zhang, two ends sharp.
translations.idiomatic: If it retreats to the southwest, after three months Tianqiang will appear, several zhang in length with both ends sharp.

sentences.zh: 謹視其所見之國，不可舉事用兵。

translations.literal: Carefully observe its visible state, not may raise affairs use troops.
translations.idiomatic: One must carefully observe the state where it is visible, and must not raise affairs or use troops.

sentences.zh: 其出如浮如沈，其國有土功；

translations.literal: Its emerge like float like sink, its state has earth work;
translations.idiomatic: When it emerges like floating and like sinking, that state will have earthwork;

translations.literal: Like sink like float, its wilds perish.
translations.idiomatic: when it is like sinking and like floating, the wilds will perish.

sentences.zh: 色赤而有角，其所居國昌。

translations.literal: Color red and has horn, its dwelling state prosper.
translations.idiomatic: When its color is red and it has a horn, the state where it dwells will prosper.

translations.literal: Face horn and fight those, not win.
translations.idiomatic: Those who face its horn and fight will not win.

sentences.zh: 星色赤黃而沈，所居野大穰。

translations.literal: Star color red yellow and sink, dwelling wilds great harvest.
translations.idiomatic: When the star's color is red and yellow and it sinks, the wilds where it dwells will have a great harvest.

sentences.zh: 色青白而赤灰，所居野有憂。

translations.literal: Color blue white and red gray, dwelling wilds have worries.
translations.idiomatic: When its color is blue, white, and red-gray, the wilds where it dwells will have worries.

translations.literal: Year Star enters moon, its wilds have expel minister;
translations.idiomatic: When the Year Star enters the moon, the wilds will have a minister expelled;

translations.literal: With Great White fight, its wilds have broken army.
translations.idiomatic: when it fights with the Great White, the wilds will have a broken army.

sentences.zh: 歲星一曰攝提，曰重華，曰應星，曰紀星。

translations.literal: Year Star one called Sheti, called Chonghua, called Response Star, called Record Star.
translations.idiomatic: The Year Star is also called Sheti, Chonghua, the Response Star, and the Record Star.

translations.literal: Ying Shi is pure temple, Year Star temple also.
translations.idiomatic: Ying Shi is the pure temple, and it is the temple of the Year Star.

translations.literal: Observe strong qi to place Sparkling Deluder.
translations.idiomatic: One observes the strong qi to determine the position of the Sparkling Deluder.

translations.literal: Called southern fire, governs summer, days Bing, Ding.
translations.idiomatic: It is called the southern fire, governs summer, and corresponds to the days Bing and Ding.

sentences.zh: 禮失，罰出熒惑，熒惑失行是也。

translations.literal: Ritual loses, punishment emerges Sparkling Deluder, Sparkling Deluder loses movement this is.
translations.idiomatic: When ritual is lost, punishment emerges from the Sparkling Deluder, and this is when the Sparkling Deluder loses its proper course.

translations.literal: Emerges then has troops, enters then troops scatter.
translations.idiomatic: When it emerges, there will be troops; when it enters, the troops will scatter.

translations.literal: Using its lodge command state.
translations.idiomatic: It commands the state by its lodge.

sentences.zh: （熒惑）熒惑為勃亂，殘賊、疾、喪、饑、兵。

translations.literal: (Sparkling Deluder) Sparkling Deluder is sudden chaos, remnant bandits, illness, death, famine, troops.
translations.idiomatic: The Sparkling Deluder causes sudden chaos, remnant bandits, illness, death, famine, and troops.

sentences.zh: 反道二舍以上，居之，三月有殃，五月受兵，七月半亡地，九月太半亡地。

translations.literal: Reverse way two lodges and above, dwells it, three months has calamity, five months receives troops, seven months half lose land, nine months great half lose land.
translations.idiomatic: When it reverses its course by two lodges or more and dwells there, after three months there will be calamity, after five months it will receive troops, after seven months half the land will be lost, and after nine months more than half the land will be lost.

translations.literal: Because with together emerge enter, state cut off sacrifice.
translations.idiomatic: If it emerges and enters together with it, the state will have its sacrifices cut off.

translations.literal: Dwells it, calamity returns arrives, although great should small;
translations.idiomatic: When it dwells there, if the calamity returns quickly, although it should be great it will be small;

translations.literal: Long and arrives, should small reverse great.
translations.idiomatic: if it arrives after a long time, what should be small will instead be great.

sentences.zh: 其南為丈夫［喪］，北為女子喪。

translations.literal: Its south is husband [death], north is woman death.
translations.idiomatic: To its south there will be deaths of men; to its north there will be deaths of women.

sentences.zh: 若角動繞環之，及乍前乍後，左右，殃益大。

translations.literal: If horn moves circle around it, and suddenly forward suddenly backward, left right, calamity increases great.
translations.idiomatic: If its horn moves and circles around it, and it moves suddenly forward and suddenly backward, left and right, the calamity will be even greater.

translations.literal: With other star fight, light mutually reach, is harm;
translations.idiomatic: When it fights with other stars, if their lights reach each other, it is harmful;

translations.literal: Not mutually reach, not harm.
translations.idiomatic: if they do not reach each other, it is not harmful.

sentences.zh: 五星皆從而聚于一舍，其下國可以禮致天下。

translations.literal: Five stars all follow and gather at one lodge, its below state can by ritual reach all under heaven.
translations.idiomatic: When all five stars follow and gather at one lodge, the state below it can reach all under heaven through ritual.

translations.literal: Method, emerges east moves sixteen lodges and stops;
translations.idiomatic: By method, it emerges and moves east for sixteen lodges and then stops;

translations.literal: Retrograde two lodges;
translations.idiomatic: It retrogrades for two lodges.

sentences.zh: 六旬，復東行，自所止數十舍，十月而入西方；

translations.literal: Six ten-day periods, again east moves, from where stopped count ten lodges, tenth month and enters west;
translations.idiomatic: after six ten-day periods, it again moves east, counting ten lodges from where it stopped, and in the tenth month it enters the west;

translations.literal: Hidden moves five months, emerges east.
translations.idiomatic: it moves hidden for five months, then emerges in the east.

sentences.zh: 其出西方曰「反明」，主命者惡之。

translations.literal: Its emerge west called "Fanming", ruler command those hate it.
translations.idiomatic: When it emerges in the west, it is called "Fanming," and those who hold the mandate hate it.

translations.literal: East moves urgent, one day moves one degree half.
translations.idiomatic: When it moves east urgently, it moves one and a half degrees per day.

translations.literal: Its moves east, west, south, north urgent also.
translations.idiomatic: Its movement in the east, west, south, and north is also urgent.

translations.literal: Troops each gather its below;
translations.idiomatic: troops will each gather below it;

translations.literal: Use battle, follow it win, oppose it lose.
translations.idiomatic: In battle, those who follow it will win, and those who oppose it will lose.

translations.literal: Sparkling Deluder follows Great White, army worries;
translations.idiomatic: When the Sparkling Deluder follows the Great White, the army will have worries;

translations.literal: Leaves it, army retreats.
translations.idiomatic: when it leaves it, the army will retreat.

translations.literal: Emerges Great White yin, has divided army;
translations.idiomatic: When it emerges at the yin side of the Great White, there will be a divided army;

translations.literal: Moves its yang, has partial general battle.
translations.idiomatic: when it moves at its yang side, there will be a battle with a partial general.

sentences.zh: 當其行，太白逮之，破軍殺將。

translations.literal: When its moves, Great White reaches it, breaks army kills general.
translations.idiomatic: When it is moving, if the Great White reaches it, the army will be broken and the general will be killed.

sentences.zh: 其入守犯太微、軒轅、營室，主命惡之。

translations.literal: Its enter guard violate Taiwei, Xuanyuan, Ying Shi, ruler command hate it.
translations.idiomatic: When it enters and guards or violates Taiwei, Xuanyuan, or Ying Shi, those who hold the mandate hate it.

translations.literal: Heart is Bright Hall, Sparkling Deluder temple also.
translations.idiomatic: The Heart is the Bright Hall, and it is the temple of the Sparkling Deluder.

translations.literal: Carefully observe this.
translations.idiomatic: One must carefully observe this.

sentences.zh: 歷斗之會以定填星之位。

translations.literal: Pass through Dipper's meeting to determine Filling Star's position.
translations.idiomatic: One passes through the Dipper's meeting to determine the position of the Filling Star.

sentences.zh: 曰中央土，主季夏，日戊、己，黃帝，主德，女主象也。

translations.literal: Called central earth, governs late summer, days Wu, Ji, Yellow Emperor, governs virtue, female ruler image also.
translations.idiomatic: It is called the central earth, governs late summer, corresponds to the days Wu and Ji, is the Yellow Emperor, governs virtue, and is the image of the female ruler.

translations.literal: Year fills one lodge, its dwelling state auspicious.
translations.idiomatic: It fills one lodge per year, and the state where it dwells will be auspicious.

sentences.zh: 未當居而居，若已去而復還，還居之，其國得土，不乃得女。

translations.literal: Not should dwell and dwells, if already left and again returns, returns dwells it, its state gains earth, not then gains woman.
translations.idiomatic: If it dwells when it should not dwell, or if it has already left and returns again to dwell there, that state will gain earth, or if not, it will gain a woman.

sentences.zh: 若當居而不居，既已居之，又西東去，其國失土，不乃失女，不可舉事用兵。

translations.literal: If should dwell and not dwells, already dwells it, again west east goes, its state loses earth, not then loses woman, not may raise affairs use troops.
translations.idiomatic: If it should dwell but does not dwell, or if it has already dwelled there and then goes west or east, that state will lose earth, or if not, it will lose a woman, and one must not raise affairs or use troops.

translations.literal: Its dwells long, its state blessing thick;
translations.idiomatic: If it dwells for a long time, that state will have abundant blessings;

translations.literal: Change, blessing thin.
translations.idiomatic: if it changes, the blessings will be thin.

translations.literal: Its one name called Earth Marquis, governs year.
translations.idiomatic: One of its names is Earth Marquis, and it governs the year.

sentences.zh: 歲行十（二）［三］度百十二分度之五，日行二十八分度之一，二十八歲周天。

translations.literal: Year moves ten (two) [three] degrees and five one-hundred-twelfths of a degree, daily moves one twenty-eighth of a degree, twenty-eight years circles heaven.
translations.idiomatic: It moves thirteen degrees and five one-hundred-twelfths of a degree per year, at a rate of one twenty-eighth of a degree per day, and completes a circuit of heaven in twenty-eight years.

sentences.zh: 其所居，五星皆從而聚于一舍，其下之國，可［以］重致天下。

translations.literal: Its dwelling, five stars all follow and gather at one lodge, its below state, can [by] weight reach all under heaven.
translations.idiomatic: When it is at its dwelling, and all five stars follow and gather at one lodge, the state below it can reach all under heaven through weight.

sentences.zh: 禮、德、義、殺、刑盡失，而填星乃為之動搖。

translations.literal: Ritual, virtue, righteousness, killing, punishment all lose, and Filling Star then for it shakes.
translations.idiomatic: When ritual, virtue, righteousness, killing, and punishment are all lost, the Filling Star will then shake for it.

translations.literal: Excess, is king not peaceful;
translations.idiomatic: When there is excess, the king will not be peaceful;

translations.literal: Its contraction, has army not return.
translations.idiomatic: when there is contraction, there will be an army that does not return.

sentences.zh: 填星，其色黃，九芒，音曰黃鐘宮。

translations.literal: Filling Star, its color yellow, nine rays, sound called Huangzhong gong.
translations.idiomatic: The Filling Star has a yellow color, nine rays, and its sound is called Huangzhong gong.

sentences.zh: 其失次上二三宿曰贏，有主命不成，不乃大水。

translations.literal: Its lose position above two three lodges called excess, has ruler command not complete, not then great water.
translations.idiomatic: When it loses its position by two or three lodges above, it is called excess, and the ruler's mandate will not be completed, or if not, there will be great floods.

sentences.zh: 失次下二三宿曰縮，有后戚，其歲不復，不乃天裂若地動。

translations.literal: Lose position below two three lodges called contraction, has empress sorrow, that year not return, not then heaven splits like earth moves.
translations.idiomatic: When it loses its position by two or three lodges below, it is called contraction, and the empress will have sorrow, that year will not return, or if not, the heaven will split or the earth will move.

sentences.zh: 斗為文太室，填星廟，天子之星也。

translations.literal: Dipper is Wen Great Chamber, Filling Star temple, Son of Heaven's star also.
translations.idiomatic: The Dipper is the Wen Great Chamber, the temple of the Filling Star, and it is the star of the Son of Heaven.

translations.literal: Wood Star with earth combines, is internal chaos.
translations.idiomatic: When the Wood Star combines with earth, there will be internal chaos.

translations.literal: Famine, ruler not use battle, lose;
translations.idiomatic: There will be famine, and the ruler must not use battle, or he will be defeated;

translations.literal: Water then changes plans and changes affairs;
translations.idiomatic: if it is water, then plans will change and affairs will be altered;

translations.literal: Fire is drought;
translations.idiomatic: if it is fire, there will be drought;

translations.literal: Metal is white clothes meeting like water.
translations.idiomatic: if it is metal, there will be a white clothes meeting or water.

sentences.zh: 金在南曰牝牡，年穀熟，金在北，歲偏無。

translations.literal: Metal at south called female male, year grain ripe, metal at north, year partial none.
translations.idiomatic: When metal is in the south, it is called female and male, and the year's grain will ripen; when metal is in the north, the year will be partially without grain.

sentences.zh: 火與水合為焠，與金合為鑠，為喪，皆不可舉事，用兵大敗。

translations.literal: Fire with water combines is quenching, with metal combines is melting, is death, all not may raise affairs, use troops great lose.
translations.idiomatic: When fire combines with water, it is quenching; when it combines with metal, it is melting, and there will be death. In all these cases, one must not raise affairs, and if one uses troops, there will be a great defeat.

translations.literal: Earth is worries, ruler evil minister;
translations.idiomatic: if it is earth, there will be worries, and the ruler will have an evil minister;

sentences.zh: 大饑，戰敗，為北軍，軍困，舉事大敗。

translations.literal: Great famine, battle lose, is north army, army trapped, raise affairs great lose.
translations.idiomatic: There will be great famine, battle will be lost, it will be the northern army, the army will be trapped, and if one raises affairs, there will be a great defeat.

sentences.zh: 土與水合，穰而擁閼，有覆軍，其國不可舉事。

translations.literal: Earth with water combines, harvest and block obstruct, has overturned army, its state not may raise affairs.
translations.idiomatic: When earth combines with water, there will be harvest but also obstruction, there will be an overturned army, and that state must not raise affairs.

translations.literal: Emerges, loses land;
translations.idiomatic: when it emerges, land will be lost;

sentences.zh: 三星若合，其宿地國外內有兵與喪，改立公王。
四星合，兵喪并起，君子憂，小人流。
五星合，是為易行，有德，受慶，改立大人，掩有四方，子孫蕃昌；
晚出者為縮，縮者為主人。
相陵為斗，七寸以內必之矣。
赤角犯我城，黃角地之爭，白角哭泣之聲，青角有兵憂，黑角則水。
五星同色，天下偃兵，百姓寧昌。
春風秋雨，冬寒夏暑，動搖常以此。
填星出百二十日而逆西行，西行百二十日反東行。
見三百三十日而入，入三十日復出東方。
太歲在甲寅，鎮星在東壁，故在營室。
曰西方，秋，（司兵月行及天矢）日庚、辛，主殺。
其出行十八舍二百四十日而入。
入東方，伏行十一舍百三十日；
其入西方，伏行三舍十六日而出。
當出不出，當入不入，是謂失舍，不有破軍，必有國君之篡。
其紀上元，以攝提格之歲，與營室晨出東方，至角而入；
與營室夕出西方，至角而入；
凡出入東西各五，為八歲，二百二十日，復與營室晨出東方。
其始出東方，行遲，率日半度，一百二十日，必逆行一二舍；
上極而反，東行，行日一度半，一百二十日入。
其始出西［方］，行疾，率日一度半，百二十日；
上極而行遲，日半度，百二十日，旦入，必逆行一二舍而入。
當出不出，未當入而入，天下偃兵，兵在外，入。
未當出而出，當入而不入，［天］下起兵，有破國。
其出東為東，入東為北方；
出西（逆行）至東，正西國吉。
日方南金居其南，日方北金居其北，曰贏，侯王不寧，用兵進吉退凶。
日方南金居其北，日方北金居其南，曰縮，侯王有憂，用兵退吉進凶。
用兵象太白：太白行疾，疾行；
其已出三日而復，有微入，入三日乃復盛出，是謂耎，其下國有軍敗將北。
其已入三日又復微出，出三日而復盛入，其下國有憂；
師有糧食兵革，遺人用之；
其色大圜黃滜，可為好事；
五星皆從太白而聚乎一舍，其下之國可以兵從天下。
行勝色，色勝位，有位勝無位，有色勝無色，行得盡勝之。
出而留桑榆閒，疾其下國。
上而疾，未盡其日，過參天，疾其對國。
金、木星合，光，其下戰不合，兵雖起而不鬬；
出西方，昏而出陰，陰兵彊；
雞鳴出，大弱：是謂陰陷於陽。
其在東方，乘明而出陽，陽兵之彊，雞鳴出，小弱；
昏出，大弱：是謂陽陷於陰。
太白伏也，以出兵，兵有殃。
其相犯，太白出其南，南國敗；
色白五芒，出蚤為月蝕，晚為天夭及彗星，將發其國。
出東為德，舉事左之迎之，吉。
出西為刑，舉事右之背之，吉。
晝見而經天，是謂爭明，彊國弱，小國彊，女主昌。
其他名殷星、太正、營星、觀星、宮星、明星、大衰、大澤、終星、大相、天浩、序星、月緯。
察日辰之會，以治辰星之位。
曰北方水，太陰之精，主冬，日壬、癸。
刑失者，罰出辰星，以其宿命國。
是正四時：仲春春分，夕出郊奎、婁、胃東五舍，為齊；
仲夏夏至，夕出郊東井、輿鬼、柳東七舍，為楚；
仲秋秋分，夕出郊角、亢、氐、房東四舍，為漢；
仲冬冬至，晨出郊東方，與尾、箕、斗、牽牛俱西，為中國。
其時宜效不效為失，追兵在外不戰。
其當效而出也，色白為旱，黃為五穀熟，赤為兵，黑為水。
出東方，大而白，有兵於外，解。
其與太白俱出東方，皆赤而角，外國大敗，中國勝；
其與太白俱出西方，皆赤而角，外國利。
五星分天之中，積于東方，中國利；
積于西方，外國用［兵］者利。
五星皆從辰星而聚于一舍，其所捨之國可以法致天下。
出而與太白不相從，野雖有軍，不戰。
若出西方，太白出東方，為格，野雖有兵不戰。
失其時而出，為當寒反溫，當溫反寒。
當出不出，是謂擊卒，兵大起。
其入太白中而上出，破軍殺將，客軍勝；
辰星來抵太白，太白不去，將死。
正旗上出，破軍殺將，客勝；
其繞環太白，若與鬬，大戰，客勝。
兔過太白，閒可椷劍，小戰，客勝。
摩太白，有數萬人戰，主人吏死；
出太白右，去三尺，軍急約戰。
兔七命，曰小正、辰星、天欃、安周星、細爽、能星、鉤星。
其色黃而小，出而易處，天下之文變而不善矣。
兔五色，青圜憂，白圜喪，赤圜中不平，黑圜吉。
赤角犯我城，黃角地之爭，白角號泣之聲。
其出東方，行四舍四十八日，其數二十日，而反入于東方；
其出西方，行四舍四十八日，其數二十日，而反入于西方。
其一候之營室、角、畢、箕、柳。
夏不見，有六十日之旱，月蝕。
冬不見，陰雨六十日，有流邑，夏則不長。
七星為員官，辰星廟，蠻夷星也。
抱為和，背［為］不和，為分離相去。
氣暈先至而後去，居軍勝。
後至先去，前後皆病，居軍不勝。
見而去，其發疾，雖勝無功。
白虹屈短，上下兌，有者下大流血。
日暈制勝，近期三十日，遠期六十日。
以其直及日所宿，加以日時，用命其國也。
角、天門，十月為四月，十一月為五月，十二月為六月，水發，近三尺，遠五尺。
行南北河，以陰陽言，旱水兵喪。
月蝕歲星，其宿地，饑若亡。
熒惑也亂，填星也下犯上，太白也彊國以戰敗，辰星也女亂。
月食始日，五月者六，六月者五，五月復六，六月者一，而五月者五，凡百一十三月而復始。
甲、乙，四海之外，日月不占。
昭明星，大而白，無角，乍上乍下。
五殘星，出正東東方之野。
其星狀類辰星，去地可六丈。
大賊星，出正南南方之野。
星去地可六丈，大而赤，數動，有光。
司危星，出正西西方之野。
星去地可六丈，大而白，類太白。
獄漢星，出正北北方之野。
星去地可六丈，大而赤，數動，察之中青。
此四野星所出，出非其方，其下有兵，沖不利。
四填星，所出四隅，去地可四丈。
地維咸光，亦出四隅，去地可三丈，若月始出。
燭星，狀如太白，其出也不行。
如星非星，如雲非雲，命曰歸邪。
星者，金之散氣，［其］本曰火。
漢者，亦金之散氣，其本曰水。
漢，星多，多水，少則旱，其大經也。
天鼓，有音如雷非雷，音在地而下及地。
天狗，狀如大奔星，有聲，其下止地，類狗。
所墮及，望之如火光炎炎沖天。
其下圜如數頃田處，上兌者則有黃色，千里破軍殺將。
蚩尤之旗，類彗而後曲，象旗。
旬始，出於北斗旁，狀如雄雞。
枉矢，類大流星，蛇行而倉黑，望之如有毛羽然。
其狀無常，常出於有道之國。
凡望雲氣，仰而望之，三四百里；
平望，在桑榆上，千餘［里］二千里；
登高而望之，下屬地者三千里。
車氣乍高乍下，往往而聚。
前高而後卑者，不止而反。
氣相遇者，卑勝高，兌勝方。
氣來卑而循車通者，不過三四日，去之五六里見。
氣來高七八尺者，不過五六日，去之十餘里見。
氣來高丈餘二丈者，不過三四十日，去之五六十里見。
稍云精白者，其將悍，其士怯。
其大根而前絕遠者，當戰。
杓雲如繩者，居前亙天，其半半天。
而澤摶密，其見動人，乃有占；
故北夷之氣如群畜穹閭，南夷之氣類舟船幡旗。
大水處，敗軍場，破國之虛，下有積錢，金寶之上，皆有氣，不可不察。
雲氣各象其山川人民所聚積。
故候息秏者，入國邑，視封疆田疇之正治，城郭室屋門戶之潤澤，次至車服畜產精華。
若煙非煙，若雲非雲，郁郁紛紛，蕭索輪囷，是謂卿雲。
若霧非霧，衣冠而不濡，見則其域被甲而趨。
（天）［夫］雷電、蝦虹、辟歷、夜明者，陽氣之動者也，春夏則發，秋冬則藏，故候者無不司之。
水澹（澤竭）地長，［澤竭］見象。
城郭門閭，閨臬［枯槁］槁枯；
歲始或冬至日，產氣始萌。
臘明日，人眾卒歲，一會飲食，發陽氣，故曰初歲。
而漢魏鮮集臘明正月旦決八風。
故八風各與其沖對，課多者為勝。
欲終日（有雨）有雲，有風，有日。
無雲有風日，當其時，淺而多實；
有雲風，無日，當其時，深而少實；
有日，無雲，不風，當其時者稼有敗。
則風復起，有雲，其稼復起。
各以其時用雲色占種（其）所宜。
是日光明，聽都邑人民之聲。
率日食一升，至七升而極；
數至十二日，日直其月，占水旱。
為其環（城）［域］千里內占，則（其）為天下候，竟正月。
月所離列宿，日、風、雲，占其國。
正月上甲，風從東方，宜蠶；
冬至短極，縣土炭，炭動，鹿解角，蘭根出，泉水躍，略以知日至，要決晷景。
太史公曰：自初生民以來，世主曷嘗不歷日月星辰？
及至五家、三代，紹而明之，內冠帶，外夷狄，分中國為十有二州，仰則觀象於天，俯則法類於地。
天則有日月，地則有陰陽。
天則有列宿，地則有州域。
三光者，陰陽之精，氣本在地，而聖人統理之。
所見天變，皆國殊窟穴，家占物怪，以合時應，其文圖籍禨祥不法。
是以孔子論六經，紀異而說不書。
昔之傳天數者：高辛之前，重、黎；
夫天運，三十歲一小變，百年中變，五百載大變；
三大變一紀，三紀而大備：此其大數也。
上下各千歲，然後天人之際續備。
太史公推古天變，未有可考于今者。
蓋略以春秋二百四十二年之閒，日蝕三十六，彗星三見，宋襄公時星隕如雨。
天子微，諸侯力政，五伯代興，更為主命，自是之後，眾暴寡，大并小。
秦、楚、吳、越，夷狄也，為彊伯。
田氏篡齊，三家分晉，并為戰國。
爭於攻取，兵革更起，城邑數屠，因以饑饉疾疫焦苦，臣主共憂患，其察禨祥候星氣尤急。
近世十二諸侯七國相王，言從衡者繼踵，而皋、唐、甘、石因時務論其書傳，故其占驗淩雜米鹽。
二十八舍主十二州，斗秉兼之，所從來久矣。
秦之疆也，候在太白，占於狼、弧。
吳、楚之疆，候在熒惑，占於鳥衡。
燕、齊之疆，候在辰星，占於虛、危。
宋、鄭之疆，候在歲星，占於房、心。
晉之疆，亦候在辰星，占於參罰。
及秦并吞三晉、燕、代，自河山以南者中國。
中國於四海內則在東南，為陽；
其西北則胡、貉、月氏諸衣旃裘引弓之民，為陰；
故中國山川東北流，其維，首在隴、蜀，尾沒于勃、碣。
是以秦、晉好用兵，復占太白，太白主中國；
而胡、貉數侵掠，獨占辰星，辰星出入躁疾，常主夷狄：其大經也。
熒惑為孛，外則理兵，內則理政。
故曰「雖有明天子，必視熒惑所在」。
諸侯更彊，時菑異記，無可錄者。
秦始皇之時，十五年彗星四見，久者八十日，長或竟天。
其後秦遂以兵滅六王，并中國，外攘四夷，死人如亂麻，因以張楚并起，三十年之閒兵相駘藉，不可勝數。
自蚩尤以來，未嘗若斯也。
項羽救鉅鹿，枉矢西流，山東遂合從諸侯，西坑秦人，誅屠咸陽。
平城之圍，月暈參、畢七重。
吳楚七國叛逆，彗星數丈，天狗過梁野；
及兵起，遂伏尸流血其下。
元光、元狩，蚩尤之旗再見，長則半天。
其後京師師四出，誅夷狄者數十年，而伐胡尤甚。
兵征大宛，星茀招搖：此其犖犖大者。
若至委曲小變，不可勝道。
由是觀之，未有不先形見而應隨之者也。
夫自漢之為天數者，星則唐都，氣則王朔，占歲則魏鮮。
故甘、石歷五星法，唯獨熒惑有反逆行；
逆行所守，及他星逆行，日月薄蝕，皆以為占。
余觀史記，考行事，百年之中，五星無出而不反逆行，反逆行，嘗盛大而變色；
日月薄蝕，行南北有時：此其大度也。
故紫宮、房心、權衡、咸池、虛危列宿部星，此天之五官坐位也，為經，不移徙，大小有差，闊狹有常。
水、火、金、木、填星，此五星者，天之五佐，為［經］緯，見伏有時，所過行贏縮有度。
日變修德，月變省刑，星變結和。
太上修德，其次修政，其次修救，其次修禳，正下無之。
夫常星之變希見，而三光之占亟用。
日月暈適，雲風，此天之客氣，其發見亦有大運。
然其與政事俯仰，最近（大）［天］人之符。
終始古今，深觀時變，察其精粗，則天官備矣。
白帝行德，以正月二十日、二十一日，月暈圍，常大赦載，謂有太陽也。
一曰：白帝行德，畢、昴為之圍。
不三暮，及圍不合，德不成。
